review_data.title: Great food and friendly service
review_data.content: I have been visiting this restaurant already more than 3 times (not incl. take away). it is one of my favorite Chinese/Taiwanese restaurants in Zurich. Not fancy but simply tasty and well cooked. I suggest to book a table before visiting especially for dinners. PS....More

review_data.title: Ladies evening at Lotus Garden
review_data.content: My friends and I enjoyed at this restaurant "ladies evening". Here you can have an intimate atmosphere, the staff is very friendly and the food is delicious. At the end of our dinner we tasted a specific drink from the hause.

review_data.title: Great Food & Service
review_data.content: We were a Family of 10 and found the Food and Service excellent. Lots of vegetarian choices also and the food is freshly prepared. Very nice and clean ambience. Will visit again.

review_data.title: Table booked at 13.00

review_data.title: We are already addicted to Lotus Garden
review_data.content: Fresh, authentic and really delicious food! If you are looking for a real Taiwanese restaurant in Switzerland, Lotus Garden is the one, guaranteed! Nice and relax atmosphere makes you feel home; good service and nice smiles. Super clean and well decorated and very honest prices...More

review_data.title: One of the bester from Zurich for chinese food!
review_data.content: Quality food, fresh! Made with fresh vegetables! all fresh! The employees who work are very kind and nice!

review_data.title: Authentic Chinese food in Zurich, 100% recommend.

review_data.title: Amazing time
review_data.content: I went there with my mum a couple weeks ago and had an amazing waiter serving us trying his best to make us feel the most comfortable! We absolutely enjoyed being there and the food is delicious!! Can't wait to come back soon!

review_data.title: Good snacks

review_data.title: Authentic Chinese food

review_data.title: Looking for Asian food in Zurich

review_data.title: Dinner time

review_data.title: Good food and good service

review_data.title: Great find

review_data.title: Standard dishes, but well executed
review_data.content: Good . . . for Zürich. By London standards it's a bit generic, but the food is well executed. All takeaway is freshly cooked and you can sit outside the kitchen window and have it handed straight to you.

review_data.title: Fairly decent Chinese restaurant in Kreis 2

The only down side was that too much salt was used, presumably on account of how Swiss people really like their food salty. On...More

review_data.title: Excellent chinese food
review_data.content: Best beef sechuan I have had in Zurich. Service is excellent. Reasonably priced at lunchtime. The oriental piped music was a bit loud.
